channel.title: Noob questions
channel.description: Hi i tried whonix today on virtualbox. This is may a retarded question but im rly stuck, i cant connect to the internet? How do you connect to wifi? Thanks in advance.............

item.title: Noob questions
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It uses your host’s internet connection. So if you host internet connection - be it wifi or not - is working, that will do for Whonix as well.

Living in a censored area perhaps? Please see this chapter:

Whonix – 18 Jun 19

Computer Security Education - Whonix

THIS WIKI PAGE IS DEPRECATED AND OUTDATED. PLEASE REFER TO THE COMPUTER SECURITY EDUCATION SECTION - https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation

Read full topic
